title: framework for Community action in the field of water policy, as amended,
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Drinking
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Drinking 

Water) (Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

Amendment of Regulation 4(2) of European Union (Drinking Water) 
Regulations 2014
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (drinking water) (amendment) regulation 2022 amendment regulation 4(2) european union (drinking water) regulation 2014

title: framework for Community action in the field of water policy, as amended,
heading: 2. Regulation 4(2) of the European Union (Drinking Water) Regulations
text_raw:
2. Regulation 4(2) of the European Union (Drinking Water) Regulations 

2014 (S.I. No. 122 of 2014) is amended – 

(a) 

(b) 

in subparagraph (a), by substituting “health,” for “health, and”, 

in subparagraph (b), by substituting “Schedule, and” for 
“Schedule.”, and 

(c) 

by inserting after subparagraph (b), the following subparagraph: 

“(c) 

it meets the requirements of the Directive.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 June, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

1 OJ No. L 330, 05.12.1998, p. 32. 
2 OJ No. L 327, 22.12.2000, p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th June, 2022.
